algorithm_technique: Sort enemies based on the ratio of (health/power) to damage. Iterate through sorted enemies, accumulating damage and calculating total damage dealt.
problem_summary_simple: Minimize total damage Bob takes by strategically defeating enemies with his power.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy approach: sort enemies by (health/power)/damage ratio. Accumulate damage over time as enemies are defeated sequentially.
key_insights: The optimal strategy is to defeat enemies that are 'cheapest' to kill in terms of total damage taken by Bob.
The 'cost' of an enemy is related to how many turns it takes to defeat it and how much damage it deals per turn.
Sorting by the ratio of turns to damage per turn (health/power / damage) helps identify the most efficient enemies to target first.
